long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SCENES: Prompts to Reflect 

Transform your new tab into a moment of reflection with SCENES: Prompts to Reflect. This extension, companion to the postcard book curated by electronic artist Jamie Reddington (Sound of Fractures), displays thought-provoking prompts and images submitted by the public.
Each time you open a new tab, you'll encounter a unique prompt designed to encourage introspection, gratitude, and emotional connection. These prompts, mirroring those found in the physical postcard book, offer a digital pause in your day-to-day browsing.

Features:
Daily changing prompts and images
Community-sourced content
Minimalist design for distraction-free reflection


SCENES: Prompts to Reflect brings the ethos of mindfulness and human connection into your digital space, reminding you to take a moment for yourself amidst the fast-paced online world. Whether you're seeking a brief mental reset or a deeper moment of contemplation, this extension provides a unique, enriching new tab experience, inviting you to reflect and disconnect."
